titleStmt.title: The svvaggering damsell A comedy. / Written by R.C..
titleStmt.author: Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke; and are to be sold at his shop, at the Greene Dragon, in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Variant: A2 is cancelled in copy at reel 1167:4.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
